name: widget
description: Widget is the foundation class from which all YUI 3 widgets are derived.
author: sdesai
ericf

examples.name: widget-extend
examples.description: Shows how to extend the base widget class, to create your own Widgets.

examples.name: widget-build
examples.displayName: Creating Custom Widget Classes With Extensions
examples.description: Shows how to use Base.create and mix/match extensions to create custom Widget classes.

examples.name: widget-plugin
examples.description: Shows how to create an IO plugin for Widget.

examples.name: widget-tooltip
examples.displayName: Creating a Simple Tooltip Widget With Extensions
examples.description: Shows how to extend the Widget class, and add WidgetPosition and WidgetStack to create a Tooltip widget class.

examples.name: widget-parentchild-listbox
examples.description: Shows how to extend the Widget class, and add WidgetParent and WidgetChild to create a simple ListBox widget.
